resources.string:
==Physical characteristics== **Spectral type:** G2V (yellow, main sequence)
 **Age:** 4.6 billion years
 **Mean diameter:** 1.392×10^^6^^ km (109 Earths)
 **Flattening:** 9×10^^−6^^
 **Volume:** 1.412×10^^18^^ km³ (1,300,000 Earths)
 **Mass:** 1.989×10^^30^^ kg (333,000 Earths)
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 274 m/s² (27.9 g)
 **Escape velocity** (from surface)**:** 618 km/s

===Density=== **Average:** 1,408 kg/m³
 **Center:** 162,200 kg/m³ (modeled)
 **Lower photosphere:** 2×10^^−4^^ kg/m³
 **Lower chromosphere:** 5×10^^−6^^ kg/m³
 **Corona:** 1×10^^−12^^ kg/m³

===Temperature=== **Center:** ~1.57×10^^7^^ K (modeled)
 **Photosphere:** 5,778 K (effective)
 **Corona:** ~5×10^^6^^ K
 **Luminosity:** 3.846×10^^26^^ W, ~3.75×10^^28^^ lm
==Rotation characteristics== **Axial tilt:** 7.25(to the ecliptic)
 **Sidereal rotation period**
 **(at equator):** 25.05 days
 **(at 16° latitude):** 25.38 days
 **(at poles):** 34.4 days
 **Rotation velocity:** 7,189 km/h (at equator)
==Photospheric composition== 73.46% hydrogen
 24.85% helium
 0.77% oxygen
 0.29% carbon
 0.16% iron
 0.12% sulfur
 0.12% neon
 0.09% nitrogen
 0.07% silicon
 0.05% magnesium


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sun|wikipedia]].
